verses.name: Genesis 9:12
verses.text: And God said, This is the token of the covenant which I make between me and you and every living creature that is with you, for perpetual generations:

verses.name: Genesis 9:13
verses.text: I do set my bow in the cloud, and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 9:14
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when I bring a cloud over the earth, that the bow shall be seen in the cloud:
